    • Field Detail

      • FORCED_NO_SHADOW

        public static final Key<java.lang.Boolean> FORCED_NO_SHADOW
        This key is supposed to be used as client property of content component (with value Boolean.TRUE) to suppress shadow painting when builder is being created indirectly and client cannot call its methods
